request_parameter_descriptions.root_path: path of directory where eps_package is located
request_parameter_descriptions.partition_times: list of time requested within (time format: YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS)
request_parameter_descriptions.experiment_types: list of experiment type within [instrument_type, segment_type, target, all]; Default all of them
request_parameter_descriptions.output_dir: path of output dir (which must exist); by default soa_report_output within eps_package directory
request_parameter_descriptions.add_start_end_scenario: This flag must be set to 0/1 to allow/avoid the inclusion of periods from/util start/end eps_package window
request_parameter_descriptions.overwrite_periods: This allows to overwrite sub-periods distributing the corresponding DV in per experiment in % (only for target experiment types)
request_parameter_descriptions.include_power_metrics: Flag to enforce/avoid inclusion of power metrics; default is 0/false
request_parameter_descriptions.include_power_metrics_partition_details: [Optional] Flag to enforce/avoid inclusion of power metric partition; default is 0/false to reduce report size; take into account only if include_power_metrics=1/true
request_parameter_descriptions.include_ssmm_status_per_instruments: [Optional] Flag to enforce/avoid inclusion of SSMM status per experiment; default true/1
request_parameter_descriptions.include_instantaneous_data_rate_per_expe: [Optional] Flag to enforce/avoid inclusion of datarate per experiment; default false/0
request_parameter_descriptions.experiment_to_ignore: [Optional] list of experiment (included in eps_package) to be ignore (i.e PLATFORM); PLATFORM needed for power metrics
request_parameter_descriptions.run_simu: [optional] allowing to avoid osve re-run; default is 1/true; use for testing purpose
request_parameter_descriptions.battery_capacity_if_sim_not_run: [optional] allows to set the battery capacity in case OSVE sim not run; Only take into account if run_sin is 0/False

osve_description.scenario: Scenario folder (eps package name from timeline tool)
osve_description.juice_conf: path of the local copy of juice conf repository https://juigitlab.esac.esa.int/core-system/uplink/conf.git

kernel.local_root_dir: Path of kernel base directory ($KERNELS to be set in metakernel file); default is None/empty
kernel.remote_url: [optional] Remote url hosting spice kernel, default is ftp://spiftp.esac.esa.int/data/SPICE/JUICE/kernels/
kernel.update: Flag allowing to enforce wget update from remote_url to local_root_dir according to metakernel

osve_description.evf_data: Top event file relative path against experiment_types folder
osve_description.itl_data: Top ITL file relative path against experiment_types folder
osve_description.edf_data: Top def file relative path against (../..) + experiment_types folder
osve_description.ptr: Segmentation default pointing; Note could be .json or .xml (PTR) format
osve_description.no_ptr_cut: [optional] allowing to not cut ptr according to itl start/end times; default is False; take into account only if add_start_end_scenario = 0 and partition_times empty
osve_description.path_to_geopipeline_data: [optional] path to geopipeline data; if not specified take it from conf gitlab
osve_description.path_eps_cfg: [optional] path to eps.cfg template; if not provide use default one from osve_wrapper; if not specified take it from conf gitlab
osve_description.output_time_step: Defines the eps output reporting time step  (default: 60 seconds)
osve_description.simu_time_step: Defines the simulation delta time step (default: 1 seconds)
osve_description.simu_output_dir: Path to output directory for the simulation results (files)
